subclusters.subcluster_name: p53-Mediated Oxidative Stress and Senescence Theory
Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cells secreting SASP factors driving systemic aging and inflammation.
Emphasizes accumulation of senescent cells and SASP causing neuroinflammation and cognitive decline.
Describes SASP's dual role in tumor suppression and tumor promotion via senescent cell secretions.
Links SASP-driven chronic inflammation (inflammaging) to metabolic dysregulation and aging.
Focuses on senescent cell accumulation, SASP, and senolytic interventions to reduce aging phenotypes.
Highlights SASP secretion by senescent cells causing chronic inflammation and age-related diseases.
Describes SASP and apoptosis resistance in senescent cells contributing to aging and tissue dysfunction.
Details SASP-driven skin aging and chronic inflammation from senescent cell accumulation.
Shows multiple senescence pathways including SASP contributing to Werner syndrome and aging.
Focuses on SASP-driven fibrosis and inflammation in lung diseases linked to senescent cell accumulation.
Describes SASP and senescence in pulmonary fibrosis and systemic aging processes.
Links SASP, mitochondrial dysfunction, and DNA damage in senescent cells driving aging phenotypes.
Explores SASP's role in tumor suppression and paradoxical tumor promotion during aging.
Focuses on SASP secretion, immune clearance decline, and chronic inflammation in aging.
Highlights NF-κB signaling as a master regulator of SASP in senescent cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Premature Senescence (SIPS) and p38 MAPK Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on stress-induced premature senescence mediated by p38 MAPK signaling pathway.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and ROS Feedback Loop Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes positive feedback between DNA damage response and ROS sustaining senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53-Mediated Oxidative Stress and Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p53 and p66 roles in oxidative stress-induced senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53-Mediated Oxidative Stress and Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes p53-mediated genomic stability, ferroptosis, and their roles in aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53-Mediated Oxidative Stress and Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details p53-sestrin-AMPK-TORC1 axis linking stress response, redox regulation, and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitotic Errors and Autophagy-Dependent Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitotic errors, SAC attenuation, and autophagy-mediated Bub1b degradation driving senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere shortening, mitochondrial dysfunction, stem cell exhaustion, and SASP in senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DNA damage-induced and stress-induced premature senescence in intervertebral disc aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening, DNA damage, stem cell decline, and senescence in vascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Models endothelial aging driven by replicative senescence and progenitor cell dynamics.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes replicative senescence and clonal exhaustion of lymphocytes contributing to immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere and Mitochondrial Dysfunction-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Uses SA-β-gal biomarker to link early developmental genetic robustness to senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Deregulation and Genomic Instability-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on G1/S-phase transition deregulation, ERC accumulation, and genomic instability in yeast aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes age-related decline in autophagy leading to accumulation of damage and senescence.
